it isn't satisfying... but at the time being i didn't find a better way without redesigning the special treatment of .json extension.

comments.author: angela
comments.body: fix introduces exception in case of last path segment containing an index...

description:
the jcr-remoting-servlet contains the following commented issue:

    * TODO: TOBEFIXED will not behave properly if resource path (i.e. item name)
    * TODO  ends with .json extension and/or contains a depth-selector pattern.
summary: Jcr-Remoting: PathNotFoundException if item name ends with .json
